Message: The Shire Council was appalled to receive photographic evidence of the blatant deliberate vandalism of the nearby playground.
Over many years the playground at the Train Park has used by generations of school children.
This video is not from Council but we need to keep an eye out... who is responsible for this sort of playground in our area?
The playground was established in 1954 and is much loved today.
I'm very upset about the playground being moved. A recent meeting with the Epping to Thornleigh Third Track Alliance confirmed that the playground will be renovated and revamped.
